0010010101001111 0011111110100011 1 -> sum: 0110010011110011, cout: 0
0111000100001100 1100101110101001 0 -> sum: 0011110010110101, cout: 1
1100000011010111 1011111101011110 0 -> sum: 1000000000110101, cout: 1
1110011001111000 0111010101110101 1 -> sum: 0101101111101110, cout: 1
0110100010011110 1001110100000011 0 -> sum: 0000010110100001, cout: 1
1001100000101100 1010101000100011 0 -> sum: 0100001001001111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
